mapper.update: update time_measurement set method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_desc = #{methodDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layer = #{layer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avr_time = #{avrTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, run_count = #{runCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where measurement_id = #{measurementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select measurement_id, method, method_desc, layer, avr_time, run_count, last_time from time_measurement
